caption: I celebrated my nomination today in this delicious restaurant. happy to tell that we had a terrific evening and the place was unquestionably the reason for this fruitful celebration. The stuff  contributed in a lovely style, the cuisine was …
(Translated by Google) I just bought it and found it rotten when I came home  (Original) 刚买的  回家发现 馊了

We met with friends at this place for dinner. my friend recommended this restaurant.  Well, we were not disappointed. we were warmly welcomed by the staff members  and we had a fantastic feeling. The food was just great. We enjoyed every moment and we will visit this place again. we highly recommend this place.
